entry.value: Retrieve Kripo fragment identifiers which are similar query fragment.%%00010%%00010Based on KripoDB package (https://github.com/3D-e-Chem/kripodb)

from kripodb.canned import similarities%%00010%%00010# The name of the column containing the fragment identifiers%%00010queries = input_table['query_frag_id']%%00010%%00010# Location of distance matrix%%00010# Base url of kripodb webservice or local file%%00010# Webservice can be started with `kripodb serve /data/kripo/tiny/distances.h5` %%00010# distance_matrix = 'http://localhost:8084/kripo'%%00010distance_matrix = '/data/kripo/tiny/distances.h5'%%00010cutoff = 0.55%%00010limit = 1000%%00010%%00010output_table = similarities(queries, %%00010 distance_matrix, %%00010 cutoff,%%00010 limit)
